#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#define high 1000000007

using namespace std;
int minm[501][10001];
bool consider[501][10001];


int main()
{
int W1,W2,N,P,W,T,cap,min1,a,b,c;
vector<int> coin,weight;
scanf("%d",&T);
while(T-->0)
{
	scanf("%d%d",&W1,&W2);
	scanf("%d",&N);
	for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&P,&W);
		coin.push_back(P);
		weight.push_back(W);
	}
	cap=W2-W1;
	for(int i=1;i<=cap;i++)
	{
		minm[0][i]=high;
		consider[0][i]=0;
	}
	for(int i=0;i<=500;i++)
	{
		minm[i][0]=0;
		consider[i][0]=1;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=coin.size();i++)
	{
		for(int j=1;j<=cap;j++)
		{
			if(j-weight[i-1]<0)
			{
				a=high;
//				b=0;
				c=high;
				consider[i][j]=0;
			}
			else
			{
				if(consider[i-1][j-weight[i-1]]==1)
					a=minm[i-1][j-weight[i-1]]+coin[i-1];
				else
					a=high;
				if(consider[i][j-weight[i-1]]==1)				
					c=minm[i][j-weight[i-1]]+coin[i-1];
				else
					c=high;
			}
			b=minm[i-1][j];
			
			if(a<b && a<c)
				minm[i][j]=a;			
			else
			{
				if(b<c)
					minm[i][j]=b;
				else
					minm[i][j]=c;
			}
			if(minm[i][j]!=high)
				consider[i][j]=1;
		}
	}
	min1=high;
	for(int i=1;i<=coin.size();i++)
	{
		if(min1>minm[i][cap])
			min1=minm[i][cap];
	}
	if(min1==high)
		printf("This is impossible.\n");
	else
		printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",min1);
	coin.clear();
	weight.clear();
}
}
